name: questrade-ts
displayName: Questrade API by Luxcium (with typescript support).
description: Unofficial Questrade API wraper by Luxcium (with typescript support).

scripts.out:clean:all: npm run out:clean; npm run out:quick:all
scripts.out:serial: npm run out:clean; npm run out:sys && npm run out:amd && npm run out:cjs && npm run out:umd
scripts.out:amd:clean: npm run out:clean; npm run out:amd
scripts.out:sys:clean: npm run out:clean; npm run out:sys
scripts.out:cjs:clean: npm run out:clean; npm run out:cjs
scripts.out:umd:clean: npm run out:clean; npm run out:umd
scripts.out:clean:all:e: npm run out:clean; npm run out:quick:all:e
scripts.copy:static:files: npm run copy:package:json && npm run copy:npmignore && npm run copy:LICENSE && npm run copy:readme
scripts.predist:install: rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npm install && npm i -D @types/node@latest
scripts.predist:check: npm run proto:test && echo 'will smoke:test' && echo 'will test'
scripts.quick:predist: npm run gitcheck && npm run build && npm run copy:static:files && rimraf ./build/tmp
scripts.predist: npm run predist:install && npm run quick:predist && echo done
scripts.pretest: tsc --noEmit --pretty && npm run lint && npm run smoke:test
scripts.release:minor: npm run predist:check && npm version minor && npm run dist
scripts.release:patch: npm run predist:check && npm version patch && npm run dist
scripts.release:again: npm run predist:check && npm run dist

author: Luxcium <luxcium@neb401.com>
